text: Inspired by the issue and a lunch break I've put together a code snippet to fulfill this functionality until its native. Just enter this into your dev tools console if your spending some time of a HubDB table and the headers will be sticky. All it does in clone the titles and append to the top of the table with a small offset detector to track horizontal scroll.
Could we fulfill the same functionality with one of those CSS styler plugins like "Stylish" <https://userstyles.org/>
and just fix them w/ a z-index or something
Upon further inspection: it's constantly re-rendering >>> thus your solution <@U55HX4F7T> seems to be one of (for now) the only solutions
